item.title: Site compound set up on residential street for use of highways workers living in street, 13th October
item.description:
Site directly outside 12 Napier Drive GL34UE. Obstructing emergency services turning point and residential street access. Allowing work storage materials on residential street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Napier Drive, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracks in pavement, 13th October
item.description:
Between Waterton Close and Grierson Close. I have fallen twice while walking my dog and had to be helped up. Others have told me about similar problems. If this is not fixed urgently then someone could be seriously injured which could lead to the department being sued.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Folland Avenue, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outstanding GL53 potholes repairs scheduled for Sept 2025, 13th October
item.description:
When will the potholes in front of 110 and 112 charlton lane cheltenham gl53 be repaired? This work was scheduled for mid last but was cancelled for unknown reasons. It needs to be done before winter sets in; its still dangerous for car and bike users. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
